body_html:
transforms.RandomCrop(size=32, padding=(0,1,2,3)),

This is incorrect usage, this is not expected to work.
Refer to https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/torchvision/transforms.html#torchvision.transforms.RandomCrop for correct usage, maybe you want padding=(1,1,1,1) or something like that
body_text:
transforms.RandomCrop(size=32, padding=(0,1,2,3)),

This is incorrect usage, this is not expected to work.
Refer to https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/torchvision/transforms.html#torchvision.transforms.RandomCrop for correct usage, maybe you want padding=(1,1,1,1) or something like that
body:
> transforms.RandomCrop(size=32, padding=(0,1,2,3)),

This is incorrect usage, this is not expected to work.
Refer to https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/torchvision/transforms.html#torchvision.transforms.RandomCrop for correct usage, maybe you want `padding=(1,1,1,1)` or something like that
